description: Running bin/nova-{compute,scheduler,network,objectstore} fails to read the bin/nova.conf flagfile.  An obvious indicator of this is that the processes do not start daemonized, even if --nodaemon is specified in bin/nova.conf.
title: bin/nova-* processes fail to read flagfile

comments.content: Running bin/nova-{compute,scheduler,network,objectstore} fails to read the bin/nova.conf flagfile.  An obvious indicator of this is that the processes do not start daemonized, even if --nodaemon is specified in bin/nova.conf.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~gundlach
